name: Shootaball
description:
A new sport for future! Come and play a little tournament in the new sports of ShootaBall. This completely new sport is designed for fans of shooting and games with balls. Just shoot at the ball so it goes to the opposite part of the field, so easy! But don't forget about the recoil, or it might fling you out to the air. And is that all? Who knows.... But beware, a lot of crazy stuff can happen during a match of shootaball.

Good luck... And have fun.
